snippet.title: Adeona Trailer
snippet.description:
Adeona is a top-down puzzle adventure game where our protagonist Amber must fight her way to the gods to save her brother and liberate the people of Arkadia. 

Adeona’s primary mechanics revolve around swapping your color to solve puzzles. Amber’s badge color dictates the way you interact with NPCs, how you attack, and when you can avoid conflicts. 

Arkadia is an unrefined world set centuries after a disease has destroyed humanity. To survive humans went into hiding, and now they’ve returned to rebuild civilization with the help of their malicious gods.
